content: the butterscotch hat is a great everyday hat it is a ribbed beanie knit from the bottom up in the round without seams this hat is knitted with medium-weight yarn the hat is designed to be close-fitting and has a folded brim you can knit a few additional rounds if you want the hat to stand up from the head a bit the hat is really easy to knit you will knit a long ribbed tube using circular knitting needles and shape the crown in the last 4 rounds
